about.title: Mountains of Gollak
about.description: Mountains of Gollak is a region situated in the eastern part of Kosovo, covering just over 15% of the country's territory. Gollak, as a region within Kosovo, encompasses more than 120 villages, while outside of it there are over 30 villages. The map of Kosovo has four main regions. In the north is Kopaonik. To the west are the Albanian Alps. In the south is the Sharr Mountains. In the east lies Gollak.

villa1.description:
About this space

Relax with the whole family at this peaceful place to stay.

The space
Large, modern and comfy villa, with view of the Prishtina skyline.
Quiet but central with 24-hour shopping nearby and access to public transport within 3 minutes walking distance.
Villa also includes a baby bed for the little ones and a Smart TV for quiet nights in!
